metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Now we are able to create, update, and delete members in our database, and we start by giving them all a date for when they became members.
content.html: Now we are able to create, update, and delete members in our database, and we start by giving them all a date for when they became members.

content.text: Click the first member, Stalikken , to open the record for editing, and give him a joined_date :
content.html: Click the first member, Stalikken, to open the record for editing, and give him a joined_date:

content.text: While we are in here, let us give him a phone number as well:
content.html: While we are in here, let us give him a phone number as well:

content.text: Click "SAVE" and go back to the list of all members:
content.html: Click "SAVE" and go back to the list of all members:

content.text: Repeat these steps and give all members a date and a phone number, and end up with a list like this:
